NE Countries table1.template: SELECT name, pop_est, gdp_md_est FROM dev.natural_earth_countries WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} ORDER BY id ASC FETCH FIRST 99 ROW ONLY;

NE GDP/Population Layer Table.template: SELECT id, name, gdp_md_est, pop_est FROM dev.natural_earth_countries WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} ORDER BY id ASC FETCH FIRST 99 ROW ONLY;

Random Data Series.template: SELECT id AS id, random1 AS random1, random2 AS random2, random3 AS random3, random4 AS random4, random5 AS random5, random5 AS rev_random1, random4 AS rev_random2, random3 AS rev_random3, random2 AS rev_random4, random1 AS rev_random5 FROM dev.uk_glx_sites WHERE id = ${id};

Nearest competitors Sites.template: SELECT (ROUND(((ST_Transform(a.geom_4326, 3857) <#> ST_Transform(b.geom_p_4326, 3857))/1000)::numeric, 2))::text AS dist,(b.fascia)::text AS fascia,(b.postcode)::text AS postcode FROM dev.uk_glx_sites a, geodata.uk_glx_open_retail_points b WHERE a.id = ${id} ORDER BY ST_Transform(a.geom_4326, 3857) <#> ST_Transform(b.geom_p_4326, 3857) NULLS LAST LIMIT 5;

UK Retail Places Layer Table.template: SELECT tid AS qID, id, dev_date ,rp_type, comp_strgh, est_units, est_brands FROM dev.retailplaces WHERE true ${viewport} ORDER BY tid ASC FETCH FIRST 99 ROW ONLY;

UK Retail Places Profile.template: SELECT ROUND(comparison::numeric, 2) AS comparison, ROUND(conv::numeric, 2) AS conv, ROUND(fbl::numeric, 2) AS fbl, ROUND(services::numeric, 2) AS services, ROUND(classbrass::numeric, 2) AS classbrass FROM dev.retailplaces WHERE tid = ${id};

UK Retail Points Layer Table.template: SELECT id, retailpoint_id, retailer, fascia FROM dev.retailpoints ORDER BY id ASC FETCH FIRST 99 ROW ONLY;

UK Shops with catchments all catchments.template: SELECT jsonb_build_object('type', 'FeatureCollection','features', b.features) AS collection FROM (SELECT jsonb_build_array(jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'primary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_primary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'secondary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_secondary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'tertiary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_tertiary)::jsonb)) AS features FROM (SELECT * FROM dev.storelist_1507__19 where id = ${id}) a) b

infoj.title: OA pop_11
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT AVG(a.pop__11) FROM dev.retailplaces a, dev.oa b WHERE ST_INTERSECTS(a.geom, b.geom) AND a.id = $1

Scratch.meta: Free Draw / Selection Tool. This is a test layer for editing and drawing geometries.

infoj.title: RP Count
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT sum(1) FROM dev.retailpoints, dev.scratch WHERE st_intersects(dev.retailpoints.geom, st_transform(dev.scratch.geom_3857, 4326)) AND dev.scratch.id = $1

infoj.name: All catchments - query
infoj.query: UK Shops with catchments all catchments
infoj.__fieldfx: SELECT jsonb_build_object('type', 'FeatureCollection','features', b.features) AS collection FROM (SELECT jsonb_build_array(jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'primary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_primary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'secondary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_secondary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'tertiary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_tertiary)::jsonb)) AS features FROM (SELECT * FROM dev.storelist_1507__19 where id = $1) a) b
